mapper.select: SELECT v.vacation_id, e.position, u.emp_name, DATE_FORMAT(v.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(v.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS end_date, v.vacation_type, v.status, v.comment FROM Vacation v INNER JOIN Request r ON v.request_idx = r.request_idx INNER JOIN Employee e ON r.emp_idx = e.emp_idx INNER JOIN Users u ON e.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE u.remove = 0 ORDER BY v.start_date DESC

SELECT v.vacation_id, e.team, e.position, u.emp_name, e.emp_idx, DATE_FORMAT(v.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS start_date, DATE_FORMAT(v.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS end_date, v.vacation_type, v.status, v.comment FROM Vacation v INNER JOIN Request r ON v.request_idx = r.request_idx INNER JOIN Employee e ON r.emp_idx = e.emp_idx INNER JOIN Users u ON e.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE u.remove = 0 ORDER BY v.start_date DESC
